Bhayangkara FC vs Semen Padang FC, Almeida Bicara Target Tim
01 Nov 2019, 13:22 by Antara, Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pelatih Semen Padang FC, Eduardo Almeida, menyatakan laga melawan Bhayangkara FC dalam lanjutan Liga 1 2019 merupakan pertandingan sulit. Namun ia meminta anak-anak asuhnya untuk tidak kehilangan poin terus-menerus agar bisa keluar dari zona degradasi.
"Salah satu target kami mengumpulkan poin dalam pertandingan ini. Kami tidak boleh lagi kehilangan poin. Jadi target besok adalah mengumpulkan poin meski kami tahu besok pertandingan yang sulit," ujar Almeida dalam sesi konferensi pers pralaga di Stadion PTIK, Jakarta, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Datang ke markas Bhayangkara, pasukan Kabau Sirah datang dengan kekuatan pincang. Dua pemain asing andalan, Dany Karl Max dan Vanderlei Fransisco, absen akibat hukuman akumulasi kartu.
Irsyad Maulana dan Vendry Mofu juga kondisinya masih dalam pemantauan akibat mengalami cedera. Meski terancam tak diperkuat pemain inti, Almeida yakin pemain pengganti memiliki kualitas yang sama.
"Kami akan memberikan yang terbaik, kami percaya pada pemain lain, kami percaya kami bisa bermain bagus dan memenangkan pertandingan," kata dia.
Menurut dia, Semen Padang dalam kondisi memerlukan motivasi dan dukungan agar bisa keluar dari zona degradasi. Saat ini posisi mereka berada di dasar klasemen dengan 22 poin dari 25 kali bertanding.
Apabila memenangkan pertandingan, Kabau Sirah akan menggeser PSIS Semarang di posisi 14 unggul agregat gol.
"Kita tahu akan sangat sulit bagi kami mengumpulkan poin di sini. Kami harus punya motivasi lebih untuk bisa mencuri poin, harus bertarung habis-habisan demi poin," katanya.

ANTARA

Bhayangkara FC vs Semen Padang FC, Almeida Targets Team Target
Nov 01 2019, 13:22 by Antara, Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Semen Padang FC coach Eduardo Almeida said the match against Bhayangkara FC in the 2019 League 1 continuation was a difficult match. But he asked the foster children not to lose points continuously in order to get out of the relegation zone.
"One of our targets to collect points in this match. We can no longer lose points. So the target tomorrow is to collect points even though we know tomorrow is a difficult match," Almeida said in a pre-match press conference session at PTIK Stadium, Jakarta, Friday, November 1 2019.
Coming to the Bhayangkara base, Kabau Sirah troops came with a crippled force. Two mainstay foreign players, Dany Karl Max and Vanderlei Fransisco, were absent due to a card accumulation penalty.
Irsyad Maulana and Mofu Vendry are also in a condition of being monitored due to injuries. Although threatened not strengthened core players, Almeida believes substitute players have the same quality.
"We will give our best, we believe in other players, we believe we can play well and win games," he said.
According to him, Semen Padang is in a condition that requires motivation and support to get out of the degradation zone. Currently their position is at the bottom of the standings with 22 points from 25 matches.
If you win the match, Kabau Sirah will move PSIS Semarang in position 14th on goal aggregate.
"We know it will be very difficult for us to collect points here. We have to have more motivation to be able to steal points, have to fight it out for points," he said.
